thread.section_title: Clothoo - Varsity Jackets Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Clothoo - Varsity Jackets | clothoo.com
thread.title: MARY KOWALEWSKI
thread.title_full: Clothoo - Varsity Jackets reviewed by MARY KOWALEWSKI

author: MARY KOWALEWSKI
title: MARY KOWALEWSKI
text: Our Junior Roller Derby team wanted to order "letter jackets." I looked everywhere on the internet to order custom jackets when I ran across Clothoo. The experience was PERFECT every step of the way, from initial contact through the day they arrived. Waseem contacted me through every step of the process to confirm sizes, colors, fonts. Sent me pictures of every step as well. These are custom jackets made to the customer's specifications. If you want an excellent quality jacket look no further Clothoo is the place. They are simply the most beautiful jacket I have ever seen. Our derby team is 100% happy that is a group of 18 girls ages 7-17 that Clothoo was able to please!!! I have heard the parents say the girls are sleeping in them and very proudly wear them everywhere.
